Pre-Game Insights: Zambia are chasing their first win in the tournament since 2012 and face a win-or-bust scenario.
Morocco are tipped as the tournament's strongest contenders, targeting their second AFCON title.
Zambia will be without Rodrick Kabwe due to suspension, with Tandi Mwape replacing him.
Morocco's attacking intent is evident, with 25 shots taken (11 on target) across their first two matches.
Zambia's form has been mixed with two draws and a loss in their opening matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a high-stakes clash with significant implications for both teams' tournament progression.
Morocco has dominated this fixture in past meetings, with only one win in six meetings for Zambia.
